resources.string:
(anniversary) - Happy Anniversary, Love. My love for you grows with each passing year. - After 10 years, I still feel like we are newlyweds. (baby welcome) - Congratulations on the birth of you new baby. - Congratulations on your new bundle of joy.
(graduation) - Congratulations! Glad to hear the good news! - Congratulations! Keep up the good work.
(wedding) - To happy endings and new beginnings. Congratulations! - Congratulations and best wishes for a beautiful future.
(birthday) - May all your birthday wishes come true! - Wishing you a special birthday.
(corporate) - Its always a pleasure working with you. - Best of luck in your new venture.
